warnings.description: Very long first day (04:40 arrival to 00:30 check-in). Over 20 hours awake with jet lag from Paris.
warnings.recommendation: Consider cutting some attractions (熹玥盒子, 李子坝站, or drone show) if feeling exhausted. Massage at midnight may be too late - could reschedule to Day 2 or skip.

warnings.description: Spa massage scheduled 22:30-00:00, check-in at 00:00 is very late.
warnings.recommendation: Verify spa accepts late bookings. Consider earlier timing or Day 2 instead.

warnings.description: High-speed train NOT YET BOOKED during Chinese New Year period.
warnings.recommendation: URGENT: Book immediately on 12306.cn or Trip.com. CNY trains sell out quickly.

warnings.description: High-speed train NOT YET BOOKED during Chinese New Year period.
warnings.recommendation: URGENT: Book immediately on 12306.cn or Trip.com. CNY trains sell out quickly.

warnings.description: Very tight schedule: Panda base must finish by 10:30 AM, pack by 11:00 AM, airport by 12:15 PM for 14:35 flight.
warnings.recommendation: Cannot visit Jinli Ancient Street as originally planned - no time. Panda base visit limited to 90 minutes max. Consider taxi instead of metro to save time.

warnings.description: Original plan included Jinli Ancient Street, but timeline shows no time available.
warnings.recommendation: Remove Jinli from Day 4 plan. Focus only on Panda Base before flight.

warnings.description: Heavy rain expected (18.6mm precipitation, 84% probability). Outdoor activities difficult.
warnings.recommendation: Weather-adjusted: Perfect day for indoor activities (bookstores, cafes, malls, covered Tianzifang alleys). Bring umbrella and waterproof shoes.

warnings.description: Shanghai INFJ-style spots need RedNote research (bookstores, cafes, niche boutiques).
warnings.recommendation: Complete RedNote research before Day 5 to have specific addresses and recommendations.

warnings.description: AJIYA Japanese BBQ requires advance reservation.
warnings.recommendation: Book 1-2 weeks in advance. High-demand restaurant, popular with couples.

warnings.description: Very tight schedule: 11:25 airport arrival → 13:30 hotel → 14:30 registration → 19:30 show. Only 3 hours total for hotel check-in, lunch, and registration.
warnings.recommendation: CRITICAL: Take taxi from Daxing Airport (not metro) to save 50 minutes. Registration must be quick (2.5 hours max). Light dinner only. Verify show venue and travel time.

warnings.description: 舞剧《只此青绿》venue not confirmed. Performance time 19:30 is assumed.
warnings.recommendation: Verify exact venue location and show time with booking confirmation. Adjust dinner and travel timing accordingly.

warnings.description: Rental apartment location TBD. Travel time from Orange Hotel unknown.
warnings.recommendation: Confirm apartment address before Day 9. Adjust timing based on distance from Orange Hotel.

warnings.description: Tsinghua and Peking University may require online reservation for campus entry.
warnings.recommendation: Check campus visitor policies. Book online if required. Bring passport for ID.

warnings.description: Forbidden City tickets must be booked 10 days in advance. Photography session needs 1-2 week advance booking.
warnings.recommendation: Book Forbidden City by Feb 18. Book photography studio by Feb 14-21.

warnings.description: Long day with Forbidden City (4 hours) + Photography (3 hours) + Shopping + Dinner.
warnings.recommendation: High activity day. Consider moving photography to Day 15 if too tired.

warnings.description: VERY COLD DAY: -7°C to -1°C. Outdoor activities dangerous without proper clothing.
warnings.recommendation: CRITICAL: Stay indoors as much as possible. Heavy winter clothing essential. Limit outdoor exposure. Indoor activities strongly recommended.

warnings.description: Cold day: -7°C to 4°C. Outdoor activities limited.
warnings.recommendation: Layer clothing. Limit outdoor time. Focus on indoor locations.
Keep outdoor activities brief. Focus on indoor quality time.

most_intense_days.reason: 20+ hour day with jet lag, 04:40 arrival to 00:30 check-in
Tight flight schedule, must finish panda visit by 10:30 AM
Flight + registration + evening show, only 3 hours buffer

weather_impacts.impact: Extreme cold (-7°C to -1°C), indoor activities strongly recommended
Very cold (-7°C to 4°C), limit outdoor exposure
Very cold (-7°C to 3°C), indoor farewell activities preferred

methodology.time_estimation: Based on Gaode Maps routing data, attraction duration from attractions.json, meal duration from meals.json, and realistic buffer times
methodology.travel_times: Calculated using transportation.json data with 15-30 min buffers between activities
methodology.conflict_detection: Automated check for overlapping times, insufficient travel buffers, unrealistic schedules, and weather impacts
methodology.weather_integration: Real forecast data from Open-Meteo API for Chongqing, Shanghai, and Beijing (Feb 1-14, 2026)

notes: Timeline created with exact activity names from source JSONs. All times in 24-hour format. Duration in minutes. Weather data integrated for activity recommendations. Critical constraints respected: Day 1 jet lag recovery (but schedule is very long), Day 4 panda 09:00 + 14:35 flight (very tight), Day 8 registration + evening show (tight), Beijing Tue/Wed/Thu no far daytime trips (respected). Major conflicts flagged: Day 1 over-scheduled, Day 4 no time for Jinli, Day 5 heavy rain, Day 8 tight timeline, Day 19-21 extreme cold. All booking requirements documented. Travel times include realistic buffers. Total 21 days, 147 activities scheduled.
